CSimple: Responsive example

col2l - Content is 2 columns wide on large displays.

col4m - Content is 4 columns wide on medium displays.

col6s - Content is 6 columns wide on small displays.


Only visible on Large displays.

Only visible on Medium displays.

Only visible on Small displays.
